channel.title: travel plan on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in travel plan on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: North East 2018 planning
item.description: Long prologue … someone once said ***“Happiness is to plan a trip to somewhere new with your loved ones”. *** One best friend from Santanu’s engineering college got transferred from Bangalore to Shillong last year. In his send-off party, everyone committed that they would like to visit that part of the country. The friend in question is serving our country and he promised to be our host there while we visit Shillong, the Scotland of East and British summer capital of North East.

item.title: Uttarakhand - prelude
item.description: *It has been such a long time that we posted something we almost forgot how to type long paragraphs. Maybe all due to Facebook and WhatsApp which is instant but then in when you look back you have no way to figure out what all the noise was about. Well enough of rant now let me type….*Beginning of 2017 we were very much looking for a vacation and Pamela was interested in Uttarakhand.

item.title: Visiting Paris a Desi Guide
item.description:
Me and Pamela are living in Paris for a while now and we are still enjoying going around and exploring Paris. Lots of my friends asked me about our personal opinions on the same before visiting Paris and France for a week or so. So here it is will all the best information that I can write down with out making it too boring for you.
**A brief about Paris:**Paris is divided in 2 main parts by the River Seine; the left bank and the right.
